heroTitle: OUMAROU BILLY — Building, learning, and creating intelligent solutions
heroSubtitle: AI Master’s student and fullstack developer building web, mobile, and intelligent systems through real-world projects. My goal is to learn by building useful solutions that solve practical problems.
aboutText: I am Oumarou Billy, a Master’s student in Artificial Intelligence and a fullstack developer. I design complete applications — from backend architecture to modern frontend interfaces — while continuously strengthening my AI skills through practical projects. My goal is to create scalable and useful solutions that address real challenges, especially within the African tech ecosystem, while growing as an engineer.
project1Desc: A medical content platform allowing users to interact through comments and likes without requiring account creation.
project2Desc: A web and mobile property management platform integrating communication, administration, and tenant-owner workflows.
project3Desc: A real-time discussion platform for students with private messaging and collaborative features.
project4Desc: A team-based election and event management system with a frontend focused on user experience.
